name: Hornby Organic Chocolate Espresso Bar
description:
Built on a base of creamy organic peanut butter, hearty rolled oats and coconut, with organic chocolate chips and the rich finish of a great espresso. This snack tastes more like a coffeehouse treat than an energy bar.Ingredients: rolled oats (gluten-free), peanut butter, honey, tapioca syrup, coconut, chocolate chips (cane sugar, cacao mass, cacao butter), peanuts, coffee, sea salt.Allergens: peanuts, may contain traces of sesame and tree nuts.Based on beautiful Hornby Island, BC, the team at Hornby Organic follows traditional family recipes to create tasty fuel for all your outdoor pursuits.
